review: A game where you get handed a bunch of crap and you make whatever the f*** you want!!
A great drifting experience with some nice cars and a decent soundtrack. Devs are keeping it updated frequently.10/10 would rice again
Great game... But the devs decided to remove the 'incar' camera view for some reason. At least there's a mod for it :P
Amazing game. One of my favourite third person shooters to date.
